name: Tagzidy
tag_list: tagzidy, social-networking, social-discovery, facebook, twitter, highlights, banjo
overview:
Tagzidy is a location-based social network that turns your every day life, & just being around your friends & other users, into a tag style game. When you simply leave the app running in the background of your phone, Tagzidy places a circular ‘tag radius’ beacon around your location & turns your world into a taggable world. When you and another user come within each others tag radius, a tag happens AUTOMATICALLY! Collecting tagz with other users adds to your stats & rewards you with points, trophies & other fun achievements!

Use Tagzidy to keep track of who you hang out with & how often. Compare your stats with friends. Make your every day life more fun & exciting with real time push notifications when you collect tagz, and the best part, it lets you share & connect with your friends in a fun new way!
